>I've got a site that uses JavaScript to change the action on a form when
>certain links are selected.  To emulate this in HTTPUnit, I had to add a
>setAction() method to com.meterware.httpunit.WebForm.java.  It works fine,
>but I'd rather not use a custom version of httpunit.  Is there another way
>to do this?

Have you considered using javascript unit: JSUnit 
(http://www.edwardh.com/jsunit/)?

regards,
